en..instructions: Directions: Click on all array elements from left to right to highlight them. Then click on the first and last elements to swap them.
en.av_c5: To start the exercise: Click on array elements to highlight those that make up the first sublist. Use increment
en.av_c6: Click on two array elements to swap them. Continue swapping elements in the sublist until it is sorted.
en.av_c8: . Click on array elements to highlight those that make up the next sublist. If you have already sorted the last sublist for this increment, then click the 'Done Increment' button. Do not bother to process sublists with only one element.
en.av_c9: Click on array elements to highlight those that make up the first sublist. Use increment
en.av_c10: Exercise is done, check your grade.
